Tunable.name: BULLETED_ITEM_STRUCTURE
Tunable.description: Localized string that will define a single bulleted item. e.g. * {0.String}

Tunable.name: BULLETED_LIST_STRUCTURE
Tunable.description: Localized string that will define the bulleted list start structure, this item will receive a string followed by a bulleted item e.g. {0.String} * {1.String}

Tunable.name: COLORED_TEXT
Tunable.description: Localized string that takes in a string representing a font color hex and another string, and outputs the string in that color.

Tunable.name: COMMA_LIST_STRUCTURE
Tunable.description: Localized string that defines the format for a comma-separated list. e.g. {0.String}, {1.String}

Tunable.name: COMMA_LIST_STRUCTURE_LAST_ELEMENT
Tunable.description: Localized string that defines the format of the last element of a comma- separated list. e.g. {0.String}, and {1.String}

Tunable.name: COMMA_LIST_STRUCTURE_TWO_ELEMENTS
Tunable.description: Localized string that defines the format of a two-element sequence of a comma-separated list. This does not necessarily have to include a comma. e.g. {0.String} and {1.String}

Tunable.name: CONCATENATED_STRING_STRUCTURE
Tunable.description: Localized string that will define the format for two concatenated strings. The purpose of this string is to be able to combine two strings in the game like a state of an object with its name: 'Tested Reaper Potion' and 'Untested Reaper Potion' having the 'Tested' be a string and 'Reaper Potion' be a second string separated by a space. The localized string for this concatenation WILL NOT ALWAYS be string0 followed by string1, since in different languages the order might be different, so when using this concatenated string structure type be aware of this. English e.g. {0.String} {1.String} {'Untested'} {'Reaper Potion'} Spanish e.g. {1.String} {0.String} {'Pocion de muerte} {'sin probar'}

Tunable.name: ELLIPSIS
Tunable.description: Localized string that outputs a string followed by ellipsis. e.g. {0.String}...

Tunable.name: FOR_MONEY
Tunable.description: Localized string that outputs a 'For Simoleon amount' when provided a number. e.g. For {0.Money}

Tunable.name: MONEY
Tunable.description: Localized string that outputs a Simoleon amount when provided a number. e.g. {0.Money}

Tunable.name: NAME_VALUE_PAIR_STRUCTURE
Tunable.description: Localized string that will define the pattern for name-value pairs, e.g. {0.String}: {1.String}

Tunable.name: NAME_VALUE_PARENTHESIS_PAIR_STRUCTURE
Tunable.description: Localized string that will define the pattern for name-value pairs using parenthesis. e.g. {0.String} ({1.String})

Tunable.name: NEW_LINE_LIST_STRUCTURE
Tunable.description: Localized string that will define the format for two new-line-seperated strings. e.g. {0.String} {1.String}

Tunable.name: OBJECT_DESCRIPTION_LOCALIZATION
Tunable.description: Localized factory that will receive an object and will return the localized catalog description of that object e.g. {0.ObjectDescription}

Tunable.name: OBJECT_NAME_COUNT
Tunable.description: Localized string that defines the pattern for object counts. e.g. {0.Number} {S0.{S1.ObjectName}}{P0.{P1.ObjectName}}

Tunable.name: OBJECT_NAME_COUNT_WITH_DESCRIPTION
Tunable.description: Localized string that defines the pattern for object counts. e.g. {0.Number} {S0.{S1.ObjectName}}{P0.{P1.ObjectName}} {2.String}

Tunable.name: OBJECT_NAME_INDETERMINATE
Tunable.description: Localized factory that will receive an object and will return the object name preceded by the appropriate indeterminate article. e.g. A/an {0.ObjectName}

Tunable.name: OBJECT_NAME_LOCALIZATION
Tunable.description: Localized factory that will receive an object and will return the localized catalog name of that object name e.g. {0.ObjectName}

Tunable.name: RAW_TEXT
Tunable.description: Localized string that will define take a raw string and set it as a localized string. e.g. {0.String}

Tunable.name: SIM_FIRST_NAME_LOCALIZATION
Tunable.description: Localized string that will recieve a sim and will return the First Name of the sim. e.g. {0.SimFirstName}

Tunable.name: SIM_FULL_NAME_LOCALIZATION
Tunable.description: Localized string that will recieve a sim and will return the Full Name of the sim. e.g. {0.SimFullName}

Tunable.name: START_TIME_TO_END_TIME
Tunable.description: Localized string that outputs a start to end time when provided two DateAndTimes. e.g. {0.TimeShort} to {1.TimeShort}
